# Vectors

Double Variables

```{r}
variable <- c(2, 11.2, 0, 7.0)
variable
```

```{r}
variable <- c(2L, 4L, 10L)
variable
```

```{r}
variable <- c(TRUE, FALSE)
```

```{r}
variable <- c(4, "Ravi")
```

```{r}
is.numeric(variable)
```
